sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Users, CheckCircle, Clock, BarChart3, Menu, X, LogOut, Home } from "lucide-react" import { useAuth } from "../context/AuthContext" import apiService from "../services/api" const SubAdminDashboard = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth() const [accessibleUsers, setAccessibleUsers] = useState([]) const [assignedTasks, setAssignedTasks] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [activeView, setActiveView] = useState("overview") const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(false) const [error, setError] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { fetchData() }, []) const fetchData = async () => { try { setLoading(true) const [usersRes, tasksRes] = await Promise.all([apiService.getAccessibleUsers(), apiService.getAssignedTasks()]) if (usersRes.success) setAccessibleUsers(usersRes.users || []) if (tasksRes.success) setAssignedTasks(tasksRes.tasks || []) } catch (error) { console.error("Failed to fetch data:", error) setError(error.message) } finally { setLoading(false) } } const getStats = () => { const totalAccessibleUsers = accessibleUsers.length const totalAssignedTasks = assignedTasks.length const completedTasks = assignedTasks.filter((task) => task.completed).length const pendingTasks = totalAssignedTasks - completedTasks return { totalAccessibleUsers, totalAssignedTasks, completedTasks, pendingTasks } } const stats = getStats() const renderOverview = () => (
{/* Stats Cards */}

{stats.totalAccessibleUsers}

Accessible Users

{stats.totalAssignedTasks}

Assigned Tasks

{stats.completedTasks}

Completed

{stats.pendingTasks}

Pending

{/* Recent Activity */}

Accessible Users

{accessibleUsers.slice(0, 5).map((user) => (
{user.name.charAt(0)}

{user.name}

{user.email}

{user.canView && ( View )} {user.canEdit && ( Edit )}
))}

Assigned Tasks

{assignedTasks.slice(0, 5).map((task) => (

{task.title}

Priority: {task.priority}

{task.completed ? "Completed" : "Pending"}
))}
) if (loading) { return (

Loading subadmin dashboard...

) } return (
{/* Error Display */} {error && (
{error}
)} {/* Mobile Sidebar Overlay */} {sidebarOpen && (
setSidebarOpen(false)} /> )} {/* Sidebar */}
T
SubAdmin Panel
{user?.name?.charAt(0)}

{user?.name}

SubAdmin

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Mobile Header */}

SubAdmin Dashboard

{/* Content */} {activeView === "overview" && renderOverview()}
) } export default SubAdminDashboard
